name: Legacy Housing Corporation
description: Legacy Housing Corporation is a leading manufacturer and retailer of manufactured homes and modular homes in the United States. Founded in 2005 and headquartered in Bedford, Texas, the company focuses on providing affordable housing solutions without compromising quality. Legacy Housing offers a wide variety of homes that cater to different customer needs, including single-section and multi-section homes. The company operates through a network of independent retailers and company-owned dealerships, ensuring a broad market reach. With a commitment to innovation and customer satisfaction, Legacy Housing continues to expand its product offerings and enhance its manufacturing processes. The company distinguishes itself through its attention to detail, quality craftsmanship, and a customer-centric approach. In addition to manufactured homes, Legacy Housing is also involved in providing financing options for its customers, making the home buying process more accessible. The company's mission is to provide safe, affordable, and quality housing for families across the country, contributing to the betterment of communities and enhancing the quality of life for its customers.
